state.raw_poem:
Te miro de lejos
como hipnotizado
soy yo hace unos años
pienso que me entiendo
pero estoy equivocado

cuando me acerco soy sincero
soy tan amigo que otres notan lo enamorado
y yo me miento
qué inocente

no pido ayuda
solo me fijo en el pasado desde el presente

y observo
ensimismado
cómo busco
maneras imposibles
de acercarme
travestido y de parado
perpetúo emociones un tanto enculado

yo no soy esos sentimientos
no me lo pregunto
estoy mareado

busco acomodarme contra la urgencia

te miro y soy consciente
nublo el juicio de mi mente
negadísimo y rebuscado
voy a construir una pared
y convertir todo esto
en una gran mentira
para separarnos
para distanciarnos
para que vos no existas y yo no te vea
porque verte es verme sentir cosas
que me dan vuelta todas las ideas
de mí mismo
de lo que me pidieron
de lo que me enseñaron
¿de lo que quieren o de lo que quiero?
busco escenas que recordar
cuando esté en otro presente
ya instalado

no lo sientas más por mí
si es que atento a tu legado
tan pequeño y tan atormentado
y aún así, la vida
ya habrá tiempos no suicidas
un día vas a instalar en diálogo entre vos y tu vida
vas a decirte las cosas que llevan tanto tiempo reprimidas
es dificil, yo te entiendo
pero no te carcomas la cabeza
de eso no se trata
se te va el tiro por la culata
deshacerlo todo
olvidate de lo jugado
enfocate solo en eso
transformarlo en
sentimiento apasionado
repitamos el pasado
abandonemos lo robado
reescribamos
ya sin closet
a ese niño atormentado
desarmemos esas perchas
reciclemos lo soñado

los primeros amores
los deliberados
los fracasados
frenéticos frustrados
los no visibles
no tangibles 
clave formulada para lo irrepetible
el precedente punto de partida

qué haría yo sin la pared entre tu vida la y la mía
si este amor nunca existe
y mi vida es una mentira

hay dolor exagerado
y lágrimas en la cara de un adolescente enamorado
y cuando los ojos inconscientes
miran a quien desean
y piden lo que sienten
vos de joven impensada
te replanteas cualquier cosa
menos tu deseo por esa espalda mojada

vos te queres morir porque te estás reprimiendo en mil pedazos
no te moris de esa persona que te tiene enamorado
te moris por no decirle amor
a ese sentimiento que sabes
no es inventado

te matas vos 
estés o no a su lado

este amor
no es especial
es amor de clóset
lo veo re enjaulado
no simulés destrucciones
no convienen ni entretienen
yo te espero
emocionado
pasá de lo normado
nunca más te llames
con el nombre equivocado

amigate con lo tuyo
buscá adentro, no es afuera
el secreto espera y mucho
jovencito deprimido

alma suicida

gay empedernido

relajale ya a las riendas
soltate que te atrapo
desde el futuro una encomienda
que te avisa lo evidente:
necesitás cambiar cuanto antes
y rescatar ese presente
no te olvides de vos
por querer parecerte a la otra gente

guide_answers.translationIntent: try to keep it in an informal, colloquial, oral tone close to a young speech community
guide_answers.sourceLanguageVariety: This poem is written in Spanish, most specifically Rioplatense Spanish. It's a poem by an Argentinian young trans poet

workshop_lines.original: Te miro de lejos
workshop_lines.translated: you see from a distance

workshop_lines.original: como hipnotizado
workshop_lines.translated: as if in a trance

workshop_lines.original: soy yo hace unos años
workshop_lines.translated: it's me from years past

translations.fullText: I watch you from afar
I see you from a distance
I'm catching a glimpse of you from far away

lines.original_text: Te miro de lejos

translations.fullText: like hypnotized
as if in a trance
totally mesmerized

lines.original_text: como hipnotizado

translations.fullText: it's me from a few years ago
that's me a few years back
it's me from years past

lines.original_text: soy yo hace unos años

translations.fullText: I think I understand myself
I feel like I get myself
I'm pretty sure I know myself

lines.original_text: pienso que me entiendo

translations.fullText: but I'm mistaken
but I got it wrong
but I messed up

lines.original_text: pero estoy equivocado

translations.fullText: when I get closer, I'm honest
I'm truthful when I get near
I open up when I'm close

lines.original_text: cuando me acerco soy sincero

translations.fullText: I'm such a friend that others notice how in love I am
I'm such a buddy that folks notice I'm in love
I'm so close to you that everyone sees I'm smitten

lines.original_text: soy tan amigo que otres notan lo enamorado

translations.fullText: and I lie to myself
and I fool myself
and I kid myself

lines.original_text: y yo me miento

translations.fullText: how innocent
so naive
such a fool

lines.original_text: qué inocente

translations.fullText: I don't ask for help
I ain't asking for help
Not looking for any help

lines.original_text: no pido ayuda

translations.fullText: I only look at the past from the present
I just reflect on the past from now
From today, I just think back on yesterday

lines.original_text: solo me fijo en el pasado desde el presente

translations.fullText: and I observe
and I watch
and I gaze

lines.original_text: y observo

translations.fullText: absorbed in myself
lost in thought
deep in my own world

lines.original_text: ensimismado

translations.fullText: how I search
the way I look
my quest

lines.original_text: cómo busco

translations.fullText: impossible ways
ways that can't be
ways out of reach

lines.original_text: maneras imposibles

translations.fullText: to get closer
to approach you
to move in closer

lines.original_text: de acercarme

translations.fullText: dressed up and standing
dressed up and on my feet
dressed to the nines and ready

lines.original_text: travestido y de parado

translations.fullText: I perpetuate emotions, kinda pissed off
I keep these feelings going, a bit ticked off
I'm stuck feeling things, sorta annoyed

lines.original_text: perpetúo emociones un tanto enculado

translations.fullText: I am not those feelings
Those feelings aren't me
Those aren't my feelings

lines.original_text: yo no soy esos sentimientos

translations.fullText: I don't ask myself that
I don't wonder about it
I don't even think about that

lines.original_text: no me lo pregunto

translations.fullText: I'm dizzy
I'm feeling lightheaded
I'm all woozy

lines.original_text: estoy mareado

translations.fullText: I try to settle myself against the urgency
I'm trying to get comfortable with the rush
I'm figuring out how to cope with this urgency

lines.original_text: busco acomodarme contra la urgencia

translations.fullText: I look at you and I'm aware
I see you and I realize
When I look at you, I get it

lines.original_text: te miro y soy consciente

translations.fullText: I cloud the judgment of my mind
I fog up my mind's judgment
I blur my mind's clarity

lines.original_text: nublo el juicio de mi mente

translations.fullText: super stubborn and complicated
totally stubborn and overthinking
so stubborn and tangled up

lines.original_text: negadísimo y rebuscado

translations.fullText: I'm going to build a wall
I'll put up a wall
I'll throw up a barrier

lines.original_text: voy a construir una pared

translations.fullText: and turn all of this
and make all this into
and turn the whole thing

lines.original_text: y convertir todo esto

translations.fullText: into a big lie
into one big lie
turn it all into a huge lie

lines.original_text: en una gran mentira

translations.fullText: to separate us
to split us apart
to tear us away

lines.original_text: para separarnos

translations.fullText: to distance ourselves
to keep us apart
to drift away from each other

lines.original_text: para distanciarnos

translations.fullText: so you don't exist and I don't see you
so you vanish and I can't see you
so you're not around and I'm not looking

lines.original_text: para que vos no existas y yo no te vea

translations.fullText: because seeing you is seeing myself feel things
because seeing you makes me feel things
because looking at you stirs up feelings in me

lines.original_text: porque verte es verme sentir cosas

translations.fullText: that turn all my ideas around
that spin all my thoughts around
that flip my mind upside down

lines.original_text: que me dan vuelta todas las ideas

translations.fullText: of myself
about who I am
about myself

lines.original_text: de mí mismo

translations.fullText: of what they asked of me
things they expected from me
what they wanted me to be

lines.original_text: de lo que me pidieron

translations.fullText: from what they taught me
from the things they taught me
from all they showed me

lines.original_text: de lo que me enseñaron

translations.fullText: Is it about what they want or what I want?
Is it their wishes or mine?
Is it about their desires or my own?

lines.original_text: ¿de lo que quieren o de lo que quiero?

translations.fullText: I seek scenes to remember
I'm searching for memories to hold onto
I'm looking for moments to cherish

lines.original_text: busco escenas que recordar

translations.fullText: when I'm in another present
when I'm living in another present
when I'm settled in a new present

lines.original_text: cuando esté en otro presente

translations.fullText: already settled
all set up
finally at home

lines.original_text: ya instalado

translations.fullText: don't feel it for me anymore
don't keep feeling sorry for me
stop worrying about me

lines.original_text: no lo sientas más por mí

translations.fullText: if paying attention to your legacy
if I focus on what you leave behind
if I keep an eye on your story

lines.original_text: si es que atento a tu legado

translations.fullText: so small and so tormented
so tiny and troubled
such a tiny, tortured soul

lines.original_text: tan pequeño y tan atormentado

translations.fullText: and yet, life
but still, there's life
and life's still going

lines.original_text: y aún así, la vida

translations.fullText: there will be times that aren't suicidal
someday, life's gonna feel less heavy
a time will come when life's chill

lines.original_text: ya habrá tiempos no suicidas

translations.fullText: one day you're going to set up a dialogue between you and your life
someday you'll open up a conversation with your life
one day you'll have a heart-to-heart with your own life

lines.original_text: un día vas a instalar en diálogo entre vos y tu vida

translations.fullText: You're going to tell yourself the things that have been repressed for so long
You'll finally say to yourself what you've kept bottled up for ages
You're gonna spill out those truths you've been hiding forever

lines.original_text: vas a decirte las cosas que llevan tanto tiempo reprimidas

translations.fullText: It's hard, I understand you
I get it, it's tough
I know it's tricky, I feel you

lines.original_text: es dificil, yo te entiendo

translations.fullText: but don't eat your head over it
but don't stress about it
but don't overthink it

lines.original_text: pero no te carcomas la cabeza

translations.fullText: that's not what it's about
that's not the point
that's not what it's about, really

lines.original_text: de eso no se trata

translations.fullText: your shot backfires on you
your plan backfires

words.original: se te va el tiro por la culata

translations.fullText: things turn against you

lines.original_text: se te va el tiro por la culata

translations.fullText: undo everything
tear it all down
scrap it all

lines.original_text: deshacerlo todo

translations.fullText: forget what you risked
let go of what you gambled
don't dwell on past bets

lines.original_text: olvidate de lo jugado

translations.fullText: focus only on that
just keep your eyes on that
zero in on that one thing

lines.original_text: enfocate solo en eso

translations.fullText: turn it into
change it to
morph it into

lines.original_text: transformarlo en

translations.fullText: passionate feeling
fiery emotion
burning passion

lines.original_text: sentimiento apasionado

translations.fullText: let's repeat the past
let's do it all over again
let's relive the past

lines.original_text: repitamos el pasado

translations.fullText: let's leave behind what was stolen
let's drop what we took
let's ditch the stuff we snagged

lines.original_text: abandonemos lo robado

translations.fullText: let's rewrite

words.translation: how about we do it over

translations.fullText: how about we do it over

words.translation: let's give it a new spin

translations.fullText: let's give it a new spin

lines.original_text: reescribamos

translations.fullText: already out of the closet
now with no closet
free from the closet

lines.original_text: ya sin closet

translations.fullText: to that tormented child
to that troubled kid
to that kid haunted by worries

lines.original_text: a ese niño atormentado

translations.fullText: let's take apart those hangers
let's dismantle those hangers
let's break down those hangers

lines.original_text: desarmemos esas perchas

translations.fullText: let's recycle what was dreamed
let's rethink our dreams
let's revive our old dreams

lines.original_text: reciclemos lo soñado

translations.fullText: the first loves
those early loves
those first crushes

lines.original_text: los primeros amores

translations.fullText: the deliberate ones
the intentional ones
the ones we chose

lines.original_text: los deliberados

translations.fullText: the failures
the ones who didn't make it
the ones who hit a wall

lines.original_text: los fracasados

translations.fullText: frantic frustrated
frustrated and frantic
wildly frustrated

lines.original_text: frenéticos frustrados

translations.fullText: the invisible ones
those you can't see
those hidden from sight

lines.original_text: los no visibles

translations.fullText: non-tangible
things you can't touch
out of reach

lines.original_text: no tangibles

translations.fullText: key formulated for the unrepeatable
a formula for the unique
crafted code for the one-of-a-kind

lines.original_text: clave formulada para lo irrepetible

translations.fullText: the preceding starting point
the earlier point of departure
the first jumping-off point

lines.original_text: el precedente punto de partida

translations.fullText: What would I do without the wall between your life and mine
How would I cope without the barrier between our lives
How could I manage without the wall between us

lines.original_text: qué haría yo sin la pared entre tu vida la y la mía

translations.fullText: if this love never exists
if this love isn't real
if this love's just a fantasy

lines.original_text: si este amor nunca existe

translations.fullText: and my life is a lie
and my life's just a big fib
and my life's one big sham

lines.original_text: y mi vida es una mentira

translations.fullText: there is exaggerated pain
the pain is way overblown
the pain is totally over the top

lines.original_text: hay dolor exagerado

translations.fullText: and tears on the face of a lovestruck teenager
with tears on the face of a smitten teen
with tears streaming down a young lover's face

lines.original_text: y lágrimas en la cara de un adolescente enamorado

translations.fullText: and when the unconscious eyes
and when eyes aren't aware
and when your eyes are clueless

lines.original_text: y cuando los ojos inconscientes

translations.fullText: they look at who they desire
they gaze at the one they want
they catch a glimpse of who they long for

lines.original_text: miran a quien desean

translations.fullText: and they ask for what they feel
and they reach out for what they feel
and they go after what they feel inside

lines.original_text: y piden lo que sienten

translations.fullText: you as an unforeseen youth
you, an unexpected young person
you, the youth nobody saw coming

lines.original_text: vos de joven impensada

translations.fullText: you reconsider everything
you question just about anything
you second-guess everything

lines.original_text: te replanteas cualquier cosa

translations.fullText: except your desire for that wet back
but not your craving for that damp back
apart from wanting that soaked back

lines.original_text: menos tu deseo por esa espalda mojada

translations.fullText: You want to die because you're repressing yourself into a thousand pieces
You're feeling like dying 'cause you're breaking yourself into bits
You're on the brink 'cause you're shattering inside

lines.original_text: vos te queres morir porque te estás reprimiendo en mil pedazos

translations.fullText: you don't die from that person who has you in love
you're not dying from that person you're in love with
it's not that person you're head over heels for that's killing you

lines.original_text: no te moris de esa persona que te tiene enamorado

translations.fullText: you're dying to not call it love
you're dying because you can't say it's love
you're breaking apart not saying it's love

lines.original_text: te moris por no decirle amor

translations.fullText: to that feeling you know
for that feeling you recognize
for that feeling you’re aware of

lines.original_text: a ese sentimiento que sabes

translations.fullText: it's not made up
it's not pretend
it's for real

lines.original_text: no es inventado

translations.fullText: you kill yourself
you're hurting yourself
you're tearing yourself apart

lines.original_text: te matas vos

translations.fullText: whether you're by their side or not
whether or not you're next to them
if you're with them or not

lines.original_text: estés o no a su lado

translations.fullText: this love
this kind of love
this feeling of love

lines.original_text: este amor

translations.fullText: it's not special
nothing special about it
nothing out of the ordinary

lines.original_text: no es especial

translations.fullText: it's closet love
it's that secret love
it's love locked away

lines.original_text: es amor de clóset

translations.fullText: I see it really caged
It's like I see it all trapped
Seems to me it's totally boxed in

lines.original_text: lo veo re enjaulado

translations.fullText: don't pretend destructions
don't fake any wreckage
stop acting like it's all falling apart

lines.original_text: no simulés destrucciones

translations.fullText: they're neither useful nor entertaining
they don't really help or amuse
they're not worth it and aren't fun

lines.original_text: no convienen ni entretienen

translations.fullText: I wait for you
I'm waiting for you
I'll be here for you

lines.original_text: yo te espero

translations.fullText: excited
pumped up
stoked

lines.original_text: emocionado

translations.fullText: step away from the norm
break free from the usual
ditch the ordinary

lines.original_text: pasá de lo normado

translations.fullText: never call yourself again
stop calling yourself
don't ever label yourself

lines.original_text: nunca más te llames

translations.fullText: with the wrong name
by the wrong name
calling yourself someone else

lines.original_text: con el nombre equivocado

translations.fullText: Make peace with your stuff
Get cozy with your own reality
Embrace your true self

lines.original_text: amigate con lo tuyo

translations.fullText: look inside, it's not outside
search within, not beyond
find it inside, not out there

lines.original_text: buscá adentro, no es afuera

translations.fullText: the secret waits and a lot
the secret's patiently waiting
there's a big secret hanging around

lines.original_text: el secreto espera y mucho

translations.fullText: depressed young man
downhearted young guy
sad young dude

lines.original_text: jovencito deprimido

translations.fullText: suicidal soul
soul ready to end it all
soul wanting to quit

lines.original_text: alma suicida

translations.fullText: incorrigible gay
hopelessly gay
die-hard gay

lines.original_text: gay empedernido

translations.fullText: Relax the reins already
Loosen up the reins now
Ease up on the reins already

lines.original_text: relajale ya a las riendas

translations.fullText: let go, I'll catch you
relax, I've got you
just chill, I'm here to catch you

lines.original_text: soltate que te atrapo

translations.fullText: from the future a package
a message sent from the future
a delivery from tomorrow

lines.original_text: desde el futuro una encomienda

translations.fullText: that tells you the obvious:
that points out the obvious:
that spells out the obvious:

lines.original_text: que te avisa lo evidente:

translations.fullText: you need to change as soon as possible
you gotta change right away
you've got to switch things up pronto

lines.original_text: necesitás cambiar cuanto antes

translations.fullText: and rescue that present
and grab hold of the now
and seize the moment

lines.original_text: y rescatar ese presente

translations.fullText: I watch you from afar
I see you from a distance
I'm catching a glimpse of you from far away

lines.original_text: Te miro de lejos

translations.fullText: like hypnotized
as if in a trance
totally mesmerized

lines.original_text: como hipnotizado

translations.fullText: it's me from a few years ago
that's me a few years back
it's me from years past

lines.original_text: soy yo hace unos años

I feel like I get myself
I'm pretty sure I know myself

lines.original_text: pienso que me entiendo

translations.fullText: but I'm mistaken
but I got it wrong
but I messed up

lines.original_text: pero estoy equivocado

translations.fullText: when I get closer, I'm honest
I'm truthful when I get near
I open up when I'm close

lines.original_text: cuando me acerco soy sincero

translations.fullText: I'm such a friend that others notice how in love I am
I'm such a buddy that folks notice I'm in love
I'm so close to you that everyone sees I'm smitten

lines.original_text: soy tan amigo que otres notan lo enamorado

translations.fullText: and I lie to myself
and I fool myself
and I kid myself

lines.original_text: y yo me miento

translations.fullText: how innocent
so naive
such a fool

lines.original_text: qué inocente

translations.fullText: I don't ask for help
I ain't asking for help
Not looking for any help

lines.original_text: no pido ayuda

translations.fullText: I only look at the past from the present
I just reflect on the past from now
From today, I just think back on yesterday

lines.original_text: solo me fijo en el pasado desde el presente

translations.fullText: and I observe
and I watch
and I gaze

lines.original_text: y observo

translations.fullText: absorbed in myself
lost in thought
deep in my own world

lines.original_text: ensimismado

translations.fullText: how I search
the way I look
my quest

lines.original_text: cómo busco

translations.fullText: impossible ways
ways that can't be
ways out of reach

lines.original_text: maneras imposibles

translations.fullText: to get closer
to approach you
to move in closer

lines.original_text: de acercarme

translations.fullText: dressed up and standing
dressed up and on my feet
dressed to the nines and ready

lines.original_text: travestido y de parado

translations.fullText: I perpetuate emotions, kinda pissed off
I keep these feelings going, a bit ticked off
I'm stuck feeling things, sorta annoyed

lines.original_text: perpetúo emociones un tanto enculado

translations.fullText: I am not those feelings
Those feelings aren't me
Those aren't my feelings

lines.original_text: yo no soy esos sentimientos

translations.fullText: I don't ask myself that
I don't wonder about it
I don't even think about that

lines.original_text: no me lo pregunto

translations.fullText: I'm dizzy
I'm feeling lightheaded
I'm all woozy

lines.original_text: estoy mareado

translations.fullText: I try to settle myself against the urgency
I'm trying to get comfortable with the rush
I'm figuring out how to cope with this urgency

lines.original_text: busco acomodarme contra la urgencia

translations.fullText: I look at you and I'm aware
I see you and I realize
When I look at you, I get it

lines.original_text: te miro y soy consciente

translations.fullText: I cloud the judgment of my mind
I fog up my mind's judgment
I blur my mind's clarity

lines.original_text: nublo el juicio de mi mente

translations.fullText: super stubborn and complicated
totally stubborn and overthinking
so stubborn and tangled up

lines.original_text: negadísimo y rebuscado

translations.fullText: I'm going to build a wall
I'll put up a wall
I'll throw up a barrier

lines.original_text: voy a construir una pared

translations.fullText: and turn all of this
and make all this into
and turn the whole thing

lines.original_text: y convertir todo esto

translations.fullText: into a big lie
into one big lie
turn it all into a huge lie

lines.original_text: en una gran mentira

translations.fullText: to separate us
to split us apart
to tear us away

lines.original_text: para separarnos

translations.fullText: to distance ourselves
to keep us apart
to drift away from each other

lines.original_text: para distanciarnos

translations.fullText: so you don't exist and I don't see you
so you vanish and I can't see you
so you're not around and I'm not looking

lines.original_text: para que vos no existas y yo no te vea

translations.fullText: because seeing you is seeing myself feel things
because seeing you makes me feel things
because looking at you stirs up feelings in me

lines.original_text: porque verte es verme sentir cosas

translations.fullText: that turn all my ideas around
that spin all my thoughts around
that flip my mind upside down

lines.original_text: que me dan vuelta todas las ideas

translations.fullText: of myself
about who I am
about myself

lines.original_text: de mí mismo

translations.fullText: of what they asked of me
things they expected from me
what they wanted me to be

lines.original_text: de lo que me pidieron

translations.fullText: from what they taught me
from the things they taught me
from all they showed me

lines.original_text: de lo que me enseñaron

translations.fullText: Is it about what they want or what I want?
Is it their wishes or mine?
Is it about their desires or my own?

lines.original_text: ¿de lo que quieren o de lo que quiero?

translations.fullText: I seek scenes to remember
I'm searching for memories to hold onto
I'm looking for moments to cherish

lines.original_text: busco escenas que recordar

translations.fullText: when I'm in another present
when I'm living in another present
when I'm settled in a new present

lines.original_text: cuando esté en otro presente

translations.fullText: already settled
all set up
finally at home

lines.original_text: ya instalado

translations.fullText: don't feel it for me anymore
don't keep feeling sorry for me
stop worrying about me

lines.original_text: no lo sientas más por mí

translations.fullText: if paying attention to your legacy
if I focus on what you leave behind
if I keep an eye on your story

lines.original_text: si es que atento a tu legado

translations.fullText: so small and so tormented
so tiny and troubled
such a tiny, tortured soul

lines.original_text: tan pequeño y tan atormentado

translations.fullText: and yet, life
but still, there's life
and life's still going

lines.original_text: y aún así, la vida

translations.fullText: there will be times that aren't suicidal
someday, life's gonna feel less heavy
a time will come when life's chill

lines.original_text: ya habrá tiempos no suicidas

translations.fullText: one day you're going to set up a dialogue between you and your life
someday you'll open up a conversation with your life
one day you'll have a heart-to-heart with your own life

lines.original_text: un día vas a instalar en diálogo entre vos y tu vida

translations.fullText: You're going to tell yourself the things that have been repressed for so long
You'll finally say to yourself what you've kept bottled up for ages
You're gonna spill out those truths you've been hiding forever

lines.original_text: vas a decirte las cosas que llevan tanto tiempo reprimidas

translations.fullText: It's hard, I understand you
I get it, it's tough
I know it's tricky, I feel you

lines.original_text: es dificil, yo te entiendo

translations.fullText: but don't eat your head over it
but don't stress about it
but don't overthink it

lines.original_text: pero no te carcomas la cabeza

translations.fullText: that's not what it's about
that's not the point
that's not what it's about, really

lines.original_text: de eso no se trata

translations.fullText: your shot backfires on you
your plan backfires

words.original: se te va el tiro por la culata

translations.fullText: things turn against you

lines.original_text: se te va el tiro por la culata

translations.fullText: undo everything
tear it all down
scrap it all

lines.original_text: deshacerlo todo

translations.fullText: forget what you risked
let go of what you gambled
don't dwell on past bets

lines.original_text: olvidate de lo jugado

translations.fullText: focus only on that
just keep your eyes on that
zero in on that one thing

lines.original_text: enfocate solo en eso

translations.fullText: turn it into
change it to
morph it into

lines.original_text: transformarlo en

translations.fullText: passionate feeling
fiery emotion
burning passion

lines.original_text: sentimiento apasionado

translations.fullText: let's repeat the past
let's do it all over again
let's relive the past

lines.original_text: repitamos el pasado

translations.fullText: let's leave behind what was stolen
let's drop what we took
let's ditch the stuff we snagged

lines.original_text: abandonemos lo robado

translations.fullText: let's rewrite

words.translation: how about we do it over

translations.fullText: how about we do it over

words.translation: let's give it a new spin

translations.fullText: let's give it a new spin

lines.original_text: reescribamos

translations.fullText: already out of the closet
now with no closet
free from the closet

lines.original_text: ya sin closet

translations.fullText: to that tormented child
to that troubled kid
to that kid haunted by worries

lines.original_text: a ese niño atormentado

translations.fullText: let's take apart those hangers
let's dismantle those hangers
let's break down those hangers

lines.original_text: desarmemos esas perchas

translations.fullText: let's recycle what was dreamed
let's rethink our dreams
let's revive our old dreams

lines.original_text: reciclemos lo soñado

translations.fullText: the first loves
those early loves
those first crushes

lines.original_text: los primeros amores

translations.fullText: the deliberate ones
the intentional ones
the ones we chose

lines.original_text: los deliberados

translations.fullText: the failures
the ones who didn't make it
the ones who hit a wall

lines.original_text: los fracasados

translations.fullText: frantic frustrated
frustrated and frantic
wildly frustrated

lines.original_text: frenéticos frustrados

translations.fullText: the invisible ones
those you can't see
those hidden from sight

lines.original_text: los no visibles

translations.fullText: non-tangible
things you can't touch
out of reach

lines.original_text: no tangibles

translations.fullText: key formulated for the unrepeatable
a formula for the unique
crafted code for the one-of-a-kind

lines.original_text: clave formulada para lo irrepetible

translations.fullText: the preceding starting point
the earlier point of departure
the first jumping-off point

lines.original_text: el precedente punto de partida

translations.fullText: What would I do without the wall between your life and mine
How would I cope without the barrier between our lives
How could I manage without the wall between us

lines.original_text: qué haría yo sin la pared entre tu vida la y la mía

translations.fullText: if this love never exists
if this love isn't real
if this love's just a fantasy

lines.original_text: si este amor nunca existe

translations.fullText: and my life is a lie
and my life's just a big fib
and my life's one big sham

lines.original_text: y mi vida es una mentira

translations.fullText: there is exaggerated pain
the pain is way overblown
the pain is totally over the top

lines.original_text: hay dolor exagerado

translations.fullText: and tears on the face of a lovestruck teenager
with tears on the face of a smitten teen
with tears streaming down a young lover's face

lines.original_text: y lágrimas en la cara de un adolescente enamorado

translations.fullText: and when the unconscious eyes
and when eyes aren't aware
and when your eyes are clueless

lines.original_text: y cuando los ojos inconscientes

translations.fullText: they look at who they desire
they gaze at the one they want
they catch a glimpse of who they long for

lines.original_text: miran a quien desean

translations.fullText: and they ask for what they feel
and they reach out for what they feel
and they go after what they feel inside

lines.original_text: y piden lo que sienten

translations.fullText: you as an unforeseen youth
you, an unexpected young person
you, the youth nobody saw coming

lines.original_text: vos de joven impensada

translations.fullText: you reconsider everything
you question just about anything
you second-guess everything

lines.original_text: te replanteas cualquier cosa

translations.fullText: except your desire for that wet back
but not your craving for that damp back
apart from wanting that soaked back

lines.original_text: menos tu deseo por esa espalda mojada

translations.fullText: You want to die because you're repressing yourself into a thousand pieces
You're feeling like dying 'cause you're breaking yourself into bits
You're on the brink 'cause you're shattering inside

lines.original_text: vos te queres morir porque te estás reprimiendo en mil pedazos

translations.fullText: you don't die from that person who has you in love
you're not dying from that person you're in love with
it's not that person you're head over heels for that's killing you

lines.original_text: no te moris de esa persona que te tiene enamorado

translations.fullText: you're dying to not call it love
you're dying because you can't say it's love
you're breaking apart not saying it's love

lines.original_text: te moris por no decirle amor

translations.fullText: to that feeling you know
for that feeling you recognize
for that feeling you’re aware of

lines.original_text: a ese sentimiento que sabes

translations.fullText: it's not made up
it's not pretend
it's for real

lines.original_text: no es inventado

translations.fullText: you kill yourself
you're hurting yourself
you're tearing yourself apart

lines.original_text: te matas vos

translations.fullText: whether you're by their side or not
whether or not you're next to them
if you're with them or not

lines.original_text: estés o no a su lado

translations.fullText: this love
this kind of love
this feeling of love

lines.original_text: este amor

translations.fullText: it's not special
nothing special about it
nothing out of the ordinary

lines.original_text: no es especial

translations.fullText: it's closet love
it's that secret love
it's love locked away

lines.original_text: es amor de clóset

translations.fullText: I see it really caged
It's like I see it all trapped
Seems to me it's totally boxed in

lines.original_text: lo veo re enjaulado

translations.fullText: don't pretend destructions
don't fake any wreckage
stop acting like it's all falling apart

lines.original_text: no simulés destrucciones

translations.fullText: they're neither useful nor entertaining
they don't really help or amuse
they're not worth it and aren't fun

lines.original_text: no convienen ni entretienen

translations.fullText: I wait for you
I'm waiting for you
I'll be here for you

lines.original_text: yo te espero

translations.fullText: excited
pumped up
stoked

lines.original_text: emocionado

translations.fullText: step away from the norm
break free from the usual
ditch the ordinary

lines.original_text: pasá de lo normado

translations.fullText: never call yourself again
stop calling yourself
don't ever label yourself

lines.original_text: nunca más te llames

translations.fullText: with the wrong name
by the wrong name
calling yourself someone else

lines.original_text: con el nombre equivocado

translations.fullText: Make peace with your stuff
Get cozy with your own reality
Embrace your true self

lines.original_text: amigate con lo tuyo

translations.fullText: look inside, it's not outside
search within, not beyond
find it inside, not out there

lines.original_text: buscá adentro, no es afuera

translations.fullText: the secret waits and a lot
the secret's patiently waiting
there's a big secret hanging around

lines.original_text: el secreto espera y mucho

translations.fullText: depressed young man
downhearted young guy
sad young dude

lines.original_text: jovencito deprimido

translations.fullText: suicidal soul
soul ready to end it all
soul wanting to quit

lines.original_text: alma suicida

translations.fullText: incorrigible gay
hopelessly gay
die-hard gay

lines.original_text: gay empedernido

translations.fullText: Relax the reins already
Loosen up the reins now
Ease up on the reins already

lines.original_text: relajale ya a las riendas

translations.fullText: let go, I'll catch you
relax, I've got you
just chill, I'm here to catch you

lines.original_text: soltate que te atrapo

translations.fullText: from the future a package
a message sent from the future
a delivery from tomorrow

lines.original_text: desde el futuro una encomienda

translations.fullText: that tells you the obvious:
that points out the obvious:
that spells out the obvious:

lines.original_text: que te avisa lo evidente:

translations.fullText: you need to change as soon as possible
you gotta change right away
you've got to switch things up pronto

lines.original_text: necesitás cambiar cuanto antes

translations.fullText: and rescue that present
and grab hold of the now
and seize the moment

lines.original_text: y rescatar ese presente

translation_job.full_poem:
Te miro de lejos
como hipnotizado
soy yo hace unos años
pienso que me entiendo
pero estoy equivocado

cuando me acerco soy sincero
soy tan amigo que otres notan lo enamorado
y yo me miento
qué inocente

no pido ayuda
solo me fijo en el pasado desde el presente

y observo
ensimismado
cómo busco
maneras imposibles
de acercarme
travestido y de parado
perpetúo emociones un tanto enculado

yo no soy esos sentimientos
no me lo pregunto
estoy mareado

busco acomodarme contra la urgencia

te miro y soy consciente
nublo el juicio de mi mente
negadísimo y rebuscado
voy a construir una pared
y convertir todo esto
en una gran mentira
para separarnos
para distanciarnos
para que vos no existas y yo no te vea
porque verte es verme sentir cosas
que me dan vuelta todas las ideas
de mí mismo
de lo que me pidieron
de lo que me enseñaron
¿de lo que quieren o de lo que quiero?
busco escenas que recordar
cuando esté en otro presente
ya instalado

no lo sientas más por mí
si es que atento a tu legado
tan pequeño y tan atormentado
y aún así, la vida
ya habrá tiempos no suicidas
un día vas a instalar en diálogo entre vos y tu vida
vas a decirte las cosas que llevan tanto tiempo reprimidas
es dificil, yo te entiendo
pero no te carcomas la cabeza
de eso no se trata
se te va el tiro por la culata
deshacerlo todo
olvidate de lo jugado
enfocate solo en eso
transformarlo en
sentimiento apasionado
repitamos el pasado
abandonemos lo robado
reescribamos
ya sin closet
a ese niño atormentado
desarmemos esas perchas
reciclemos lo soñado

los primeros amores
los deliberados
los fracasados
frenéticos frustrados
los no visibles
no tangibles 
clave formulada para lo irrepetible
el precedente punto de partida

qué haría yo sin la pared entre tu vida la y la mía
si este amor nunca existe
y mi vida es una mentira

hay dolor exagerado
y lágrimas en la cara de un adolescente enamorado
y cuando los ojos inconscientes
miran a quien desean
y piden lo que sienten
vos de joven impensada
te replanteas cualquier cosa
menos tu deseo por esa espalda mojada

vos te queres morir porque te estás reprimiendo en mil pedazos
no te moris de esa persona que te tiene enamorado
te moris por no decirle amor
a ese sentimiento que sabes
no es inventado

te matas vos 
estés o no a su lado

este amor
no es especial
es amor de clóset
lo veo re enjaulado
no simulés destrucciones
no convienen ni entretienen
yo te espero
emocionado
pasá de lo normado
nunca más te llames
con el nombre equivocado

amigate con lo tuyo
buscá adentro, no es afuera
el secreto espera y mucho
jovencito deprimido

alma suicida

gay empedernido

relajale ya a las riendas
soltate que te atrapo
desde el futuro una encomienda
que te avisa lo evidente:
necesitás cambiar cuanto antes
y rescatar ese presente
no te olvides de vos
por querer parecerte a la otra gente

guide_preferences.translationIntent: try to keep it in an informal, colloquial, oral tone close to a young speech community
guide_preferences.sourceLanguageVariety: This poem is written in Spanish, most specifically Rioplatense Spanish. It's a poem by an Argentinian young trans poet

state.raw_poem:
下午

时代广场的屏幕上，两株洋葱一样的人头
极速旋动——大选啦、议员啦，更多分辨不出的
社论啦，一种速溶产品。芦笋和立场是应季的，
货架摆满观点。大脑糖尿病需要重视。
一些嘴巴分食香烟，
一些嘴巴分食爱情。

窗户内外两端，对坐着挑逗和流逝。
街角桌咖啡杯里驮着湖面，
嵌入城市不可细想的眩晕症，
这下午常要比试武力。鲭鱼色大楼玻璃表面
太阳涂抹着它的浆汁。

地铁里，有人正将鼻息喷在我的颈后。
陌生与陌生间奇异的化合在
老鼠腹腔内，充当见不得光的零件
效率速度要从逃窜中获得。我的经理
建议这种出行方式。

比会议室的光线还拥挤，下午，
而夜晚回家时，人们清点并拥抱比妻子轮廓
更明显的孤独。只要一片阿司匹林，我想解决人群中的偏头痛。
可我忘了他们捕杀了全部的蝴蝶，
在水泥贮满的下午。

translation_job.full_poem:
下午

时代广场的屏幕上，两株洋葱一样的人头
极速旋动——大选啦、议员啦，更多分辨不出的
社论啦，一种速溶产品。芦笋和立场是应季的，
货架摆满观点。大脑糖尿病需要重视。
一些嘴巴分食香烟，
一些嘴巴分食爱情。

窗户内外两端，对坐着挑逗和流逝。
街角桌咖啡杯里驮着湖面，
嵌入城市不可细想的眩晕症，
这下午常要比试武力。鲭鱼色大楼玻璃表面
太阳涂抹着它的浆汁。

地铁里，有人正将鼻息喷在我的颈后。
陌生与陌生间奇异的化合在
老鼠腹腔内，充当见不得光的零件
效率速度要从逃窜中获得。我的经理
建议这种出行方式。

比会议室的光线还拥挤，下午，
而夜晚回家时，人们清点并拥抱比妻子轮廓
更明显的孤独。只要一片阿司匹林，我想解决人群中的偏头痛。
可我忘了他们捕杀了全部的蝴蝶，
在水泥贮满的下午。

state.raw_poem:
**Večerní píseň**
Když bylo dobře mamince,
bylo i pěkně v našem bytě.
Hmoždíř, který stal na skříňce,
zatřpytil se okamžitě,
skla oken, po nichž před chvilkou
plakalo ještě bílé jiní,
svítila opět po kuchyni,
kde vonělo to vanilkou.

Když zpívala, hned vesele
spustili ptáci před okny nám.
Měla-li mráček na čele,
odletěli hned ptáci jinam.
Zmlkli jsme rázem, ztichl smích.
I černé kotě, které tlapkou
pohrávalo si se skořápkou,
dívalo se jí po očích.

Když padala již únavou
a večer spát nás odnášela,
tou rukou drsnou od popela
stlala nám měkce pod hlavou.
V hořáku ještě přede plyn
a nad pelestí přechází nám,
podobaje se pavučinám,
velikánský stín maminčin.

Dnes už tak šťastně neusínám.

translations.fullText: Evening Song
A Song of Evening
Evening's Melody

lines.original_text: **Večerní píseň**

translations.fullText: When it was well with mother,
If mother felt alright,
When mom was feeling fine,

lines.original_text: Když bylo dobře mamince,

translations.fullText: it was pleasant in our flat too.
our home felt nice as well.
our place felt warm and bright.

lines.original_text: bylo i pěkně v našem bytě.

translations.fullText: The mortar that stood on the shelf,
The mortar sat upon the shelf,
The mortar perched upon the ledge,

lines.original_text: Hmoždíř, který stal na skříňce,

translations.fullText: it sparkled immediately,
it gleamed right away,
it shimmered at once,

lines.original_text: zatřpytil se okamžitě,

translations.fullText: window panes, upon which just before
the windows' glass, where moments ago
the glass panes, minutes ago

lines.original_text: skla oken, po nichž před chvilkou

translations.fullText: still cried the white others,
the pale others still wept,
still the white ones shed tears,

lines.original_text: plakalo ještě bílé jiní,

translations.fullText: shone again across the kitchen,
lit up once more through the kitchen,
once again, the kitchen gleamed,

lines.original_text: svítila opět po kuchyni,

translations.fullText: where it smelled of vanilla.
where the air was vanilla-sweet.
where vanilla's scent lingered.

lines.original_text: kde vonělo to vanilkou.

translations.fullText: When she sang, so cheerfully
As she sang, joy filled the air
Her song brought cheer to all

lines.original_text: Když zpívala, hned vesele

translations.fullText: The birds began before our windows.
Birds began singing at our window.
Birds burst into song by our windows.

lines.original_text: spustili ptáci před okny nám.

translations.fullText: If she had a cloud on her brow,
Should a shadow cross her brow,
When her forehead was clouded,

lines.original_text: Měla-li mráček na čele,

translations.fullText: the birds flew away at once elsewhere.
the birds promptly flew away.
the birds swiftly flew far away.

lines.original_text: odletěli hned ptáci jinam.

translations.fullText: We fell silent at once, and laughter ceased.
Suddenly we were quiet, laughter stopped.
The laughter hushed, as silence fell.

lines.original_text: Zmlkli jsme rázem, ztichl smích.

translations.fullText: And the black kitten, with its paw
Even the black kitten, pawing
Even the black kitten, with its gentle paw

lines.original_text: I černé kotě, které tlapkou

translations.fullText: played with a shell,
toyed with a nutshell,
dabbled with the shell,

lines.original_text: pohrávalo si se skořápkou,

translations.fullText: it looked her in the eyes.
it gazed into her eyes.
it stared deep into her eyes.

lines.original_text: dívalo se jí po očích.

translations.fullText: When she was already weary
As she grew tired
As exhaustion took over her

lines.original_text: Když padala již únavou

translations.fullText: and evening took us to our sleep,
and the evening carried us to bed,
and night wrapped us in its embrace,

lines.original_text: a večer spát nás odnášela,

translations.fullText: with that hand rough from the ash
her hand, roughened by the ash
with her hand, coarse from ash's touch

lines.original_text: tou rukou drsnou od popela

translations.fullText: softly she made our bed under our heads.
she softly prepared our bed below our heads.
gently she tucked us into bed beneath our heads.

lines.original_text: stlala nám měkce pod hlavou.

translations.fullText: In the burner still hisses the gas
The gas softly hums in the burner
The burner gently whispers with gas

lines.original_text: V hořáku ještě přede plyn

translations.fullText: and over the bed's headboard passes,
and above our bed's top it drifts,
above the bed's edge, it softly flows,

lines.original_text: a nad pelestí přechází nám,

translations.fullText: resembling spider webs,
like delicate webs,
as if spun in webs,

lines.original_text: podobaje se pavučinám,

translations.fullText: the gigantic shadow of mother.
the vast shadow cast by mom.
the enormous shadow of mom.

lines.original_text: velikánský stín maminčin.

translations.fullText: Today I no longer fall asleep so happily.
These days, I don't drift off so cheerfully.
Nowadays, sleep doesn't find me as blissful.

lines.original_text: Dnes už tak šťastně neusínám.

bylo i pěkně v našem bytě.
Hmoždíř, který stal na skříňce,
zatřpytil se okamžitě,
skla oken, po nichž před chvilkou
plakalo ještě bílé jiní,
svítila opět po kuchyni,
kde vonělo to vanilkou.

Když zpívala, hned vesele
spustili ptáci před okny nám.
Měla-li mráček na čele,
odletěli hned ptáci jinam.
Zmlkli jsme rázem, ztichl smích.
I černé kotě, které tlapkou
pohrávalo si se skořápkou,
dívalo se jí po očích.

Když padala již únavou
a večer spát nás odnášela,
tou rukou drsnou od popela
stlala nám měkce pod hlavou.
V hořáku ještě přede plyn
a nad pelestí přechází nám,
podobaje se pavučinám,
velikánský stín maminčin.

Dnes už tak šťastně neusínám.

workshop_lines.translated: Bend down my dear and kiss me on the mouth

workshop_lines.original: Με τα γρουσά χιερούθκια σου βάστα την τζεφαλή μου
workshop_lines.translated: With your little hands of gold hold my head

workshop_lines.original: Βάστα με στην αγκάλη σου, ώσπου να φκει η ψυσιή μου
workshop_lines.translated: Hold me in your embrace until my soul departs

workshop_lines.original: Τζιαι ανταν τζιαι δεις τζιαι 'ποσπαστουν, τζιαι πάσιν να με θάψουν
workshop_lines.translated: And when you see them finishing and they're about to bury me

workshop_lines.original: τες πέτρες τες ασυντυσιές, κάμε τες να με κλάψουν
workshop_lines.translated: make the dumb stones weep for me

workshop_lines.original: Τζιαι ανταν να με περάσουσιν από τη γειτονιά σου
workshop_lines.translated: And when they carry me through your neighborhood

workshop_lines.original: εύκα κρυφά της μάνας σου τζιαι τράβα τα μαλλιά σου
workshop_lines.translated: Slip away quietly from your mother and tear your hair

workshop_lines.original: Τζιαι αν αρρωστήσω μάνα μου
workshop_lines.translated: Should I fall ill my dear

translations.fullText: And if I fall ill, mother, I want to send you word
Mother, if I get sick, I'll let you know
If I fall ill, dear mother, I'll send you a message

lines.original_text: Τζι αν αρρωστήσω μάνα μου, θέλω να σου μηνύσω

translations.fullText: come, my Rose, so I can bid you farewell
come to me, dear Rose, so I can say goodbye
come to me, my lovely Rose, to bid you adieu

lines.original_text: να 'ρτεις, τριανταφυλλένη μου, να σε αποχαιρετίσω

translations.fullText: Don't fear your mother, nor anyone else
Don't be afraid of your mom, or anyone at all
Don't let fear of your mom, or anyone else, hold you back

lines.original_text: Μεν φοβηθείς την μάνα σου, μήτε κανέναν άλλον

translations.fullText: only, my Rose, hurry without delay
Rose, my dear, come swiftly, no hesitation
My Rose, hurry to me, don't linger

lines.original_text: μόνο, τριανταφυλλένη, μου, πρόφτασε δίχως άλλο

translations.fullText: And when you enter my door, don't hide your sorrow
And when you come through my door, don't conceal your grief
And should you step into my home, let your heartache show

lines.original_text: Τζιαι άντανα μπεις της πόρτας μου, μεν κρύψεις τον καμό σου

translations.fullText: But ask my mother too, and tell her, where is your son
And ask my mother, tell her where her son is
Go and ask my mom, tell her where her boy has gone

lines.original_text: Μα ρώτα τζιαι την μάνα μου, τζιαι πε της, πού εν ο γιος σου

translations.fullText: And when my mother sees you, words she'll surely give you
And when my mother sees you, she'll have plenty to say
And when my mother catches sight of you, she'll talk your ear off

lines.original_text: Τζιαι ανταν σε δει η μάνα μου, που λόγια εν να σε πάρει

translations.fullText: But you're not a doubtful love, don't let it trouble your mind
But don't let a skeptical love weigh on your mind
Don't let doubts about love trouble your thoughts

lines.original_text: Μα εν είσαι αγάπη πειστιτζή, στο νου σου μεν τα βάλεις

translations.fullText: Enter the room from the left, and come to the bed on the right
Step into the room on your left, and move right to the bed
Come in from the left side, and find your way to the bed on the right

lines.original_text: Έμπα ζερβά στην κάμαρη, τζιαι έλα δεξιά στο στρώμα

translations.fullText: Bend down, my rose, and kiss me on the mouth
Lean down, my dear, and kiss my lips
Lower yourself, my blossom, and kiss me tenderly

lines.original_text: Σιύψε, τριανταφυλλενη μου, τζιαι φίλα με στο στόμα

translations.fullText: With your strong little hands, hold my head
Hold my head with those sturdy hands of yours
With your gentle hands, cradle my weary head

lines.original_text: Με τα γρουσά χιερούθκια σου βάστα την τζεφαλή μου

translations.fullText: Hold me in your embrace, until my soul departs
Cradle me close, until my spirit leaves me
Keep me in your arms, until my essence fades away

lines.original_text: Βάστα με στην αγκάλη σου, ώσπου να φκει η ψυσιή μου

translations.fullText: And when you see them gather round, and they're going to bury me
And when you notice them gathering, ready to lay me to rest
And if you see them gathering, preparing to bury me

lines.original_text: Τζιαι ανταν τζιαι δεις τζιαι 'ποσπαστουν, τζιαι πάσιν να με θάψουν

translations.fullText: Make the unyielding stones weep for me
Have the stones shed tears for me
Let the stubborn rocks mourn my loss

lines.original_text: τες πέτρες τες ασυντυσιές, κάμε τες να με κλάψουν

translations.fullText: And when they pass me by your neighborhood
And when they take me through your street
And when they carry me past your place

lines.original_text: Τζιαι ανταν να με περάσουσιν από τη γειτονιά σου

translations.fullText: Sneak away from your mother and pull your hair
Secretly leave your mother and tug at your hair

Should I fall ill, oh mother mine

workshop_lines.translated: enterest

translations.fullText: And if I fall ill, mother mine, I desire to send thee word
Should I fall ill, dear mother, I wish to let thee know
If my health falters, mother, I long to send thee word

lines.original_text: Τζι αν αρρωστήσω μάνα μου, θέλω να σου μηνύσω

translations.fullText: Come thou, my rose of May, to bid thee farewell
Pray come, my dearest rose, that I might say adieu

words.translation: to take my leave of thee

translations.fullText: Hasten, my cherished bloom, to take my leave of thee

lines.original_text: να 'ρτεις, τριανταφυλλένη μου, να σε αποχαιρετίσω

translations.fullText: Fear not thy mother, nor any other person
Do not dread thy mother nor any other soul
Let not thy mother nor any other frighten thee

lines.original_text: Μεν φοβηθείς την μάνα σου, μήτε κανέναν άλλον

translations.fullText: Only, Rose-mine, come forth without delay
Hasten, my Rose, forsooth, without tarrying
Swiftly, dear Rose, come ere the day doth fade

lines.original_text: μόνο, τριανταφυλλένη, μου, πρόφτασε δίχως άλλο

translations.fullText: And when thou enterest my door, hide not thy sorrow.
When thou comest through my door, let not thy grief be hidden.
As thou enterest my threshold, let thy sorrow be revealed.

lines.original_text: Τζιαι άντανα μπεις της πόρτας μου, μεν κρύψεις τον καμό σου

translations.fullText: But ask also my mother, and say to her, where is thy son?
Yet inquire of my mother, and tell her, where lies her son?
Pray, seek my mother, and whisper to her, where dwells thy child?

lines.original_text: Μα ρώτα τζιαι την μάνα μου, τζιαι πε της, πού εν ο γιος σου

translations.fullText: And when my mother doth behold thee, with words she shall thee seize
When my mother spies thee, she shall engage thee with her words
If my mother doth perceive thee, words shall weave around thee

lines.original_text: Τζιαι ανταν σε δει η μάνα μου, που λόγια εν να σε πάρει

translations.fullText: But thou art not a lover of deceit, let not such thoughts in thee reside
Thou art no deceiver in love, let not such musings trouble thee
Thy heart is free from guile, let not such worries cloud thy mind

lines.original_text: Μα εν είσαι αγάπη πειστιτζή, στο νου σου μεν τα βάλεις

translations.fullText: Enter to the left in the chamber, and come to the right side of the bed
Step left into the chamber, then move rightward to the bed
Enter by the left, and journey to the right where the bed doth lie

lines.original_text: Έμπα ζερβά στην κάμαρη, τζιαι έλα δεξιά στο στρώμα

translations.fullText: Bow low, my rose-like maiden, and kiss me on the lips
Bend down, my lovely rose, and press thy lips to mine
Lean close, my darling rose, and seal thy kiss upon my lips

lines.original_text: Σιύψε, τριανταφυλλενη μου, τζιαι φίλα με στο στόμα

translations.fullText: With thy heavy little hands hold my head
Holdeth my head with thy tender hands
Gently cradle my head with thy soft palms

lines.original_text: Με τα γρουσά χιερούθκια σου βάστα την τζεφαλή μου

translations.fullText: Hold me in thine embrace, till my spirit doth depart
Enfold me in thy arms, until my soul takes flight
Cradle me in thy gentle hold, till my soul doth soar away

lines.original_text: Βάστα με στην αγκάλη σου, ώσπου να φκει η ψυσιή μου

translations.fullText: And if thou seest them depart, and they go to bury me

words.translation: to lay me in the earth

translations.fullText: And when thou dost see them leave, and proceed to lay me in the earth
And shouldst thou witness their departure, as they bear me to my grave

lines.original_text: Τζιαι ανταν τζιαι δεις τζιαι 'ποσπαστουν, τζιαι πάσιν να με θάψουν

translations.fullText: The stones of misfortune, make them weep for me
Transform the stones of ill fate to mourn my loss
Bid the stones of mischance to lament for me

lines.original_text: τες πέτρες τες ασυντυσιές, κάμε τες να με κλάψουν

translations.fullText: And when they shall bear me through thy neighborhood
And as they carry me past thy dwelling place
As they escort me by thy homestead fair

lines.original_text: Τζιαι ανταν να με περάσουσιν από τη γειτονιά σου

translations.fullText: Steal out from thy mother's sight and pull thy hair in grief
Slip away from thy mother's gaze and tug thy tresses
Depart from thy mother's watchful eye and let thy locks be torn

lines.original_text: εύκα κρυφά της μάνας σου τζιαι τράβα τα μαλλιά σου

translations.fullText: And if I fall sick, my mother dear
Should I take ill, dear mother of mine
If sickness should befall me, my mother

lines.original_text: Τζιαι αν αρρωστήσω μάνα μου

translations.fullText: And if I fall ill, mother mine, I desire to send thee word
Should I fall ill, dear mother, I wish to let thee know
If my health falters, mother, I long to send thee word

lines.original_text: Τζι αν αρρωστήσω μάνα μου, θέλω να σου μηνύσω

translations.fullText: Come thou, my rose of May, to bid thee farewell
Pray come, my dearest rose, that I might say adieu

words.translation: to take my leave of thee

translations.fullText: Hasten, my cherished bloom, to take my leave of thee

lines.original_text: να 'ρτεις, τριανταφυλλένη μου, να σε αποχαιρετίσω

translations.fullText: Fear not thy mother, nor any other person
Do not dread thy mother nor any other soul
Let not thy mother nor any other frighten thee

state.raw_poem:
Listopad wdziera się pod płaszcz, zimny i lepki,
niebo ma kolor brudnego chodnika.
W oknach kamienic gasną światła, jedno po drugim,
jakby miasto traciło cierpliwość do naszych spraw.
Mówiłaś, że miłość to dom, który buduje się latami,
ale zapomnieliśmy o dachu, gdy przyszły deszcze.
Teraz każdy z nas mieszka w innym wspomnieniu,
i boi się wyjść na zewnątrz, żeby nie zmarznąć.
Herbata stygnie, zanim zdążę pomyśleć o cukrze,
wszystko w tym życiu dzieje się albo za szybko, albo wcale.
Nie szukam już winnych, bo wina to ciężki bagaż,
a ja chcę iść lekko, nawet jeśli idę donikąd.
Jeśli kiedyś słońce przebije się przez te chmury,
nie wołaj mnie, nie próbuj naprawiać cienia.
Pozwól mi po prostu stać w tym szarym świetle,
póki nie nauczę się oddychać bez twojego imienia.

guide_answers.translationZone: Polish → Irish Hiberno-English (rural, lyrical, slightly archaic)
guide_answers.translationIntent: Preserve the "heavy" Slavic gloom while giving it the musicality of a West Coast Irish lament.

translations.fullText: November creeps beneath the coat, cold and clingy,
November slips under the cloak, chilly and sticky,
November seeps under the mantle, cold and clinging,

lines.original_text: Listopad wdziera się pod płaszcz, zimny i lepki,

translations.fullText: the sky's the hue of a sullied path.
the heavens are ashen like a worn road.
the vault above, a murky, trodden lane.

lines.original_text: niebo ma kolor brudnego chodnika.

translations.fullText: In the windows of the old stone houses, the lights fade, one after the other,
In the windows of the tenements, the lights go out, one by one,
In the panes of the grey tenements, lights dim in a weary sequence,

lines.original_text: W oknach kamienic gasną światła, jedno po drugim,

translations.fullText: as if the town were losing its patience with our tales.
like the city had no patience left for our concerns.
as if the city grew weary of our trifles.

lines.original_text: jakby miasto traciło cierpliwość do naszych spraw.

words.translation: o'er the years long and slow

translations.fullText: Ye said love is a house, built o'er the years long and slow,
You told me that love's a home, crafted through the years,
You whispered love's a dwelling, made through many a season's toil,

lines.original_text: Mówiłaś, że miłość to dom, który buduje się latami,

translations.fullText: but we forgot the roof when the rains came.
yet we missed to roof it when the rains did fall.
alas, we left the roof undone when the downpour arrived.

lines.original_text: ale zapomnieliśmy o dachu, gdy przyszły deszcze.

translations.fullText: Now each of us dwells in a different memory,
Now we each reside in our own memory,
Each of us wanders in a memory of old,

lines.original_text: Teraz każdy z nas mieszka w innym wspomnieniu,

translations.fullText: and fears to step outside, lest he feel the chill.
and dreads the cold that waits outside the door.
for fear the frost might nip his soul outside.

lines.original_text: i boi się wyjść na zewnątrz, żeby nie zmarznąć.

translations.fullText: The tea cools ere I muse on the sugar,
The tea's gone cold before sugar comes to mind,
The brew chills, long afore I think of sweetening,

lines.original_text: Herbata stygnie, zanim zdążę pomyśleć o cukrze,

translations.fullText: All in this life unfolds either with haste or not at all.
In this life, all happens too swift or not at all.
Life's journey, swift as the wind or still as a stone.

lines.original_text: wszystko w tym życiu dzieje się albo za szybko, albo wcale.

translations.fullText: I seek no blame now, for guilt's a burden heavy
I've ceased to seek the guilty, for guilt is weighty baggage
No longer I chase the shadows of blame, for the weight of guilt is too great

lines.original_text: Nie szukam już winnych, bo wina to ciężki bagaż,

translations.fullText: and I wish to tread lightly, even if I’m bound for nowhere.
and I long to walk with ease, though the path leads nowhere.
and I yearn to drift gently, e’en if it’s to no place at all.

lines.original_text: a ja chcę iść lekko, nawet jeśli idę donikąd.

translations.fullText: If ever the sun should pierce these clouds,
Should the sun ever break through these clouds,
If that bright orb should e'er find a way past these veils of mist,

lines.original_text: Jeśli kiedyś słońce przebije się przez te chmury,

translations.fullText: do not call me, nor try to mend the shadow.
don't be callin' me, nor try to fix the shadow.
don't summon me, nor patch the shadow's guise.

lines.original_text: nie wołaj mnie, nie próbuj naprawiać cienia.

translations.fullText: Let me just stand in this grey light,
Allow me to linger in this dim glow,
Let me be in this shadowy light,

lines.original_text: Pozwól mi po prostu stać w tym szarym świetle,

translations.fullText: till I learn to breathe without your name upon my lips.
until I've the knack of breathing without your name.
till I find my breath unchained from your name's embrace.

lines.original_text: póki nie nauczę się oddychać bez twojego imienia.

jakby miasto traciło cierpliwość do naszych spraw.

guide_preferences.translationZone: Polish → Irish Hiberno-English (rural, lyrical, slightly archaic)
guide_preferences.translationIntent: Preserve the "heavy" Slavic gloom while giving it the musicality of a West Coast Irish lament.

state.raw_poem:
Che, la ciudad se despierta con el ruido del bondi,
y yo, mate en mano, hago tiempo en la vereda.
El kiosco abre como si nada: pan, diarios, promesas,
y en el vidrio se me pega una cara de lunes.

Laburo, laburo… la palabra suena a llave gastada,
pero igual me empuja, como el río empuja a los barcos.
En el subte, los ojos viajan sin pasaje,
cada uno con su novela doblada en el pecho.

A la noche, cuando afloja el calor de la cabeza,
me acuerdo de tu risa: una esquina con luz amarilla.
No te digo “volvé”, porque el orgullo también trabaja,
y porque hay ausencias que se sientan a cenar.

Entonces escribo: despacito, sin hacerme el poeta,
para que la pena no se agrande con mi voz.
Si un día leés esto, entendé lo simple:
te quise bien, y todavía te quiero un poco.

stanzas.text:

translations.fullText: Hey, the city wakes up with the noise of the bus,
Hey, the city's stirring with the clatter of the bus,
Hey there, the city's alive with the racket of the bus,

lines.original_text: Che, la ciudad se despierta con el ruido del bondi,

translations.fullText: and me, with a mate in hand, kill time on the footpath.
and here I am, with a mate in hand, waiting on the pavement.
and I'm here, sipping mate, loitering on the sidewalk.

lines.original_text: y yo, mate en mano, hago tiempo en la vereda.

translations.fullText: The kiosk opens like nothing: bread, papers, promises,
The shop opens as if it's nothing: bread, papers, and promises,
Like it's just another day, the kiosk opens: bread, the papers, a few hopes,

lines.original_text: El kiosco abre como si nada: pan, diarios, promesas,

translations.fullText: and in the glass, a Monday face sticks to me.
and in the window, I catch a Monday look.
and from the glass, a Monday morning mirrors back at me.

lines.original_text: y en el vidrio se me pega una cara de lunes.

translations.fullText: Work, work… the word sounds like a worn-out key,
Work, work… it echoes like an old key,
Toil, toil… it rings like an old key,

lines.original_text: Laburo, laburo… la palabra suena a llave gastada,

translations.fullText: but it pushes me just the same, like the river pushes the boats.
but still it nudges me along, like the river does with the boats.
but it carries me along, just as the river guides the boats.

lines.original_text: pero igual me empuja, como el río empuja a los barcos.

translations.fullText: In the subway, eyes travel without a ticket,
On the metro, eyes wander ticket-free,
In the underground, eyes roam with no fare,

lines.original_text: En el subte, los ojos viajan sin pasaje,

translations.fullText: each one with their novel folded on their chest.
each with their book tucked against their chest.
each one cradling their story close to their heart.

lines.original_text: cada uno con su novela doblada en el pecho.

translations.fullText: At night, when the heat eases off the head,
In the evening, when the head cools down,
Come nightfall, when the mind feels a touch cooler,

lines.original_text: A la noche, cuando afloja el calor de la cabeza,

translations.fullText: I remember your laugh: a corner with yellow light.
I think of your laughter: a street corner under a yellow glow.
I recall your laughter: like a corner bathed in golden light.

lines.original_text: me acuerdo de tu risa: una esquina con luz amarilla.

translations.fullText: I don't say 'come back', because pride also works,
I don't ask you to return, for pride's working too,
I won't ask you back, since pride has its own way,

lines.original_text: No te digo “volvé”, porque el orgullo también trabaja,

translations.fullText: and because there are absences that sit down to dinner.
and because some absences join us at the table.
and because some absences dine with us.

lines.original_text: y porque hay ausencias que se sientan a cenar.

translations.fullText: So I write: slowly, not pretending to be a poet,
So I pen down: softly, not posing as a poet,
And so I jot down: gently, not trying to be poetic,

lines.original_text: Entonces escribo: despacito, sin hacerme el poeta,

translations.fullText: so the sorrow doesn't grow with my voice.
so my voice doesn't make the sorrow swell.
lest my voice should deepen the heartache.

lines.original_text: para que la pena no se agrande con mi voz.

translations.fullText: If one day you read this, understand the simple:
Should you read this someday, grasp the plain truth:
If ever you find this, take in the simplicity:

lines.original_text: Si un día leés esto, entendé lo simple:

translations.fullText: I loved you well, and I still love you a bit.
I cared for you truly, and there's still a bit of love left.
I held you dear, and there's a wee bit of love lingering still.

lines.original_text: te quise bien, y todavía te quiero un poco.

translation_job.full_poem:
Che, la ciudad se despierta con el ruido del bondi,
y yo, mate en mano, hago tiempo en la vereda.
El kiosco abre como si nada: pan, diarios, promesas,
y en el vidrio se me pega una cara de lunes.

Laburo, laburo… la palabra suena a llave gastada,
pero igual me empuja, como el río empuja a los barcos.
En el subte, los ojos viajan sin pasaje,
cada uno con su novela doblada en el pecho.

A la noche, cuando afloja el calor de la cabeza,
me acuerdo de tu risa: una esquina con luz amarilla.
No te digo “volvé”, porque el orgullo también trabaja,
y porque hay ausencias que se sientan a cenar.

Entonces escribo: despacito, sin hacerme el poeta,
para que la pena no se agrande con mi voz.
Si un día leés esto, entendé lo simple:
te quise bien, y todavía te quiero un poco.

Messe ocus Pangur Bán,
cechtar nathar fri saindán.
Bith a menma-sam fri seilg,
mu menma céin im saincheirg.

Caraim-se fos, ferr cach clú,
oc mu lebrán, léir ingnú.
Ní foirmtech frimm Pangur Bán,
caraid cesin a maccdán.

translations.fullText: The underground devours the faces of the commuters,
The metro consumes the commuters' faces,
The subway swallows the faces of the daily travellers,

lines.original_text: Die U-Bahn frisst die Gesichter der Pendler,

translations.fullText: a grey maw of steel and punctuality.
a steely grey maw of precision and punctuality.
a sombre gullet of metallic precision.

lines.original_text: ein grauer Schlund aus Stahl und Pünktlichkeit.

translations.fullText: I hold onto a handrail,
I grasp a handrail firmly,
I cling tightly to a rail,

lines.original_text: Ich halte mich an einer Haltestange fest,

translations.fullText: as if it were the sole anchor in this flowing world.
as though it were the only anchor in this ever-moving world.
as if it were the solitary anchor in this constantly shifting world.

lines.original_text: als wäre sie der einzige Anker in dieser fließenden Welt.

translations.fullText: We were taught that order is half of life,
We have been instructed that order constitutes half of life,
We have learned that maintaining order forms one half of existence,

lines.original_text: Man hat uns beigebracht, dass Ordnung das halbe Leben ist,

translations.fullText: but what do we do with the other half that burns?
yet what becomes of the burning other half?
and how do we handle the smouldering remainder?

lines.original_text: aber was machen wir mit der anderen Hälfte, die brennt?

translations.fullText: In your flat stand the unread books,
The unread books remain in your apartment,
Those unread books still occupy your home,

lines.original_text: In deiner Wohnung stehen noch die ungelesenen Bücher,

translations.fullText: like mute witnesses of a time we did not hold.
as silent witnesses to a time we failed to grasp.
as quiet witnesses to an era we let slip away.

lines.original_text: wie stumme Zeugen einer Zeit, die wir nicht hielten.

translations.fullText: The rain in this city lacks rhythm,
In this city, the rain holds no rhythm,
This city's rain is devoid of rhythm,

lines.original_text: Der Regen in dieser Stadt hat keinen Rhythmus,

translations.fullText: it falls simply, stubbornly and without apology.
it descends with a certain obstinacy, unapologetically.
it cascades relentlessly, devoid of any remorse.

lines.original_text: er fällt einfach, stur und ohne Entschuldigung.

translations.fullText: I close my eyes and see no future,
Closing my eyes, the future disappears,
With my eyes shut, I envision no tomorrow,

lines.original_text: Ich schließe die Augen und sehe keine Zukunft,

translations.fullText: only the afterimage of your laughter on my retina.
merely the residual image of your laughter imprinted upon my retina.
just the lingering trace of your laughter etched on my retina.

lines.original_text: nur das Nachbild deines Lachens auf meiner Netzhaut.

translations.fullText: Perhaps solitude is merely a form of freedom,
Maybe loneliness is just a type of liberty,
Could it be that solitude is but a facet of freedom,

lines.original_text: Vielleicht ist Einsamkeit nur eine Form von Freiheit,

translations.fullText: which one has not ordered, yet must still pay for.
which is not ordered, but must be paid for nonetheless.
which remains unordered, yet demands its price.

lines.original_text: die man nicht bestellt hat, aber trotzdem bezahlen muss.

translations.fullText: I alight. The doors close with a sigh.
I step out. The doors shut with a soft sigh.
I disembark. The doors whisper shut.

lines.original_text: Ich steige aus. Die Türen schließen mit einem Seufzer.

translations.fullText: Next stop: Somewhere where it no longer hurts.
Next destination: A place free from pain.
Next stop: A haven beyond suffering.

lines.original_text: Nächster Halt: Irgendwo, wo es nicht mehr wehtut.

state.raw_poem:
Aubade

Another quarantine morning hovers
over your bed to overtake the dark.
there must be fifty ways to leave these covers.

Sweep back the blackout curtains that shutter
your eyes, take a swipe at your alarm. 
Another quarantine morning hovers,

spreads like birdsong, the clean scent of clover.
Nothing can stop the sun’s diurnal arc—
not even the fifty ways to leave these covers.

Your legs feel like peanut butter.
You can’t gather strength in your arms.
Another quarantine morning hovers.

No need to dress, don’t stress or over-
think, and devote the day to your art—
there must be fifty ways. To leave these covers,

stop thinking of bodies that won’t be recovered.
Make a wish on the morning star.
Another quarantine morning hovers.
There must be a way to leave these covers.

translations.fullText: Nada puede detener el arco diurno del sol—
Nada frena el curso diario del sol—
El sol sigue su camino sin trabas—

lines.original_text: Nothing can stop the sun’s diurnal arc—

translations.fullText: ni siquiera las cincuenta formas para dejar estas cobijas.
ni las cincuenta formas de dejar estas sábanas.
ni las mil formas de escapar de estas mantas.

lines.original_text: not even the fifty ways to leave these covers.

translations.fullText: Tus piernas se sienten como manteca de maní.
Tus piernas parecen hechas de manteca de maní.
Tus piernas son como una pasta de maní.

lines.original_text: Your legs feel like peanut butter.

translations.fullText: No puedes reunir fuerza en tus brazos.
No lográs juntar fuerza en los brazos.
Falta fuerza en tus débiles brazos.

lines.original_text: You can’t gather strength in your arms.

translations.fullText: Otra mañana de cuarentena se cierne.
Se acerca otra mañana de cuarentena.
Una nueva mañana de cuarentena llega.

lines.original_text: Another quarantine morning hovers.

translations.fullText: No hay necesidad de vestirse, no te estreses o sobre-
No hace falta vestirse, ni te preocupes de más-
No hace falta vestirse, relájate sin más-

lines.original_text: No need to dress, don’t stress or over-

translations.fullText: piensa, y dedica el día a tu arte—
reflexiona, y entrega el día a tu arte—
deja de pensar, y dale el día a tu arte—

lines.original_text: think, and devote the day to your art—

translations.fullText: debe haber cincuenta formas. De dejar estas sábanas,
hay cincuenta maneras de dejar las sábanas,
hay mil maneras de salir de estas sábanas,

lines.original_text: there must be fifty ways. To leave these covers,

translations.fullText: deja de pensar en cuerpos que no serán recuperados.
olvidá los cuerpos que no recuperaremos.
deja atrás esos cuerpos perdidos.

lines.original_text: stop thinking of bodies that won’t be recovered.

translations.fullText: Pide un deseo a la estrella matutina.
Deseá algo a la estrella de la mañana.
Pedile un deseo a la estrella del alba.

lines.original_text: Make a wish on the morning star.

translations.fullText: Otra mañana de cuarentena acecha.
Una nueva mañana de cuarentena se cierne.
Una vez más, la mañana de cuarentena se aproxima.

lines.original_text: Another quarantine morning hovers.

translations.fullText: Debe haber una forma de salir de estas sábanas.
Debe haber alguna manera de salir de las sábanas.
Tiene que haber alguna forma de dejar la cama.

lines.original_text: There must be a way to leave these covers.

Corre las cortinas negras que cierran

tus ojos, apaga esa alarma molesta.
tus ojos, despacha esa alarma ruidosa.

se expande como canto de pájaro, el fresco aroma del trébol.
se despliega como el canto de un pájaro, el puro perfume del trébol.

translation_job.full_poem:
Aubade

Another quarantine morning hovers
over your bed to overtake the dark.
there must be fifty ways to leave these covers.

Sweep back the blackout curtains that shutter
your eyes, take a swipe at your alarm. 
Another quarantine morning hovers,

spreads like birdsong, the clean scent of clover.
Nothing can stop the sun’s diurnal arc—
not even the fifty ways to leave these covers.

Your legs feel like peanut butter.
You can’t gather strength in your arms.
Another quarantine morning hovers.

No need to dress, don’t stress or over-
think, and devote the day to your art—
there must be fifty ways. To leave these covers,

stop thinking of bodies that won’t be recovered.
Make a wish on the morning star.
Another quarantine morning hovers.
There must be a way to leave these covers.

state.raw_poem:
Die U-Bahn frisst die Gesichter der Pendler,
ein grauer Schlund aus Stahl und Pünktlichkeit.
Ich halte mich an einer Haltestange fest,
als wäre sie der einzige Anker in dieser fließenden Welt.
Man hat uns beigebracht, dass Ordnung das halbe Leben ist,
aber was machen wir mit der anderen Hälfte, die brennt?
In deiner Wohnung stehen noch die ungelesenen Bücher,
wie stumme Zeugen einer Zeit, die wir nicht hielten.
Der Regen in dieser Stadt hat keinen Rhythmus,
er fällt einfach, stur und ohne Entschuldigung.
Ich schließe die Augen und sehe keine Zukunft,
nur das Nachbild deines Lachens auf meiner Netzhaut.
Vielleicht ist Einsamkeit nur eine Form von Freiheit,
die man nicht bestellt hat, aber trotzdem bezahlen muss.
Ich steige aus. Die Türen schließen mit einem Seufzer.
Nächster Halt: Irgendwo, wo es nicht mehr wehtut.

translations.fullText: The subway devours commuter faces.
In the tunnel's maw, your features are swallowed whole.
We disappear into the night, faces merging with the city's pulse.

lines.original_text: Die U-Bahn frisst die Gesichter der Pendler,

translations.fullText: A steel maw of precision.
Within your silver throat, time holds sway.
We journey through urban veins of metal, ever on time.

lines.original_text: ein grauer Schlund aus Stahl und Pünktlichkeit.

translations.fullText: Gripping the support pole firmly,
With your hand clasped around a steady anchor,
We cling to the night’s bracing rail—

lines.original_text: Ich halte mich an einer Haltestange fest,

translations.fullText: As if she were the sole anchor in this transient world.
As though you are the solitary mooring in this river of life.
In the urban night, we're like the taproot in this ever-changing cityscape.

lines.original_text: als wäre sie der einzige Anker in dieser fließenden Welt.

translations.fullText: We've been taught that order defines half of life.
Through the lens of upbringing, your world is half composed of neatness.
The city lights tell us that tidiness is just half of our existence,

lines.original_text: Man hat uns beigebracht, dass Ordnung das halbe Leben ist,

translations.fullText: In the half engulfed in flames, what choice do we make?
With the inferno consuming one half, what is your course?
What do we tackle with the half that's aflame?

lines.original_text: aber was machen wir mit der anderen Hälfte, die brennt?

translations.fullText: Your flat still holds the unread tomes.
Within your quarters, untouched volumes linger.
In our place, we keep those books, still untouched, under the city lights.

lines.original_text: In deiner Wohnung stehen noch die ungelesenen Bücher,

translations.fullText: Like voiceless witnesses of a time we could not grasp.
Amidst the hush of a forgotten era, lost moments cascade away.
We stand, quiet sentinels, in the city night, time unheld.

lines.original_text: wie stumme Zeugen einer Zeit, die wir nicht hielten.

translations.fullText: The rain in this city lacks rhythm.
In this city, you find rain without a melody.
We hear the rain – no rhythm in the night city.

lines.original_text: Der Regen in dieser Stadt hat keinen Rhythmus,

translations.fullText: He collapses, obstinate and unapologetic.
Without a word, down you tumble, defiant as ever.
Into the night, we plummet, headstrong, no apologies given.

lines.original_text: er fällt einfach, stur und ohne Entschuldigung.
